question: What is the assembly language instruction that transfers the value of the index register X to the accumulator in 6502?
answer:
TXA                TXA Transfer index X to accumulator                TXA
  
  | Addressing Mode| Assembly Language Form| OP CODE |No. Bytes|No. Cycles|
  |  Implied       |   TXA                 |    8A   |    1    |    2     |
